data.title: Anime Lovers
data.text:
Red Bunny Girl - Houki Shinonono Figure by FREEing

Houki Shinonono (篠ノ之 箒) is a cute girl in IS: Infinite Stratos (インフィニット・ストラトス) harem-mecha anime series. If you like anime girl with a long Ponytail, she should be one of your list.

This time, Houki comes with Bunny costume. The costume has six pieces: a white headband with white rabbit ears, a white shirt collar with a red bowtie, a red leotard with a white cotton tail, a pair of black tights, a pair of red high heels, and a pair of white shirtcuffs.

Houki Frontside - Huge Oppai!

Houki Backside - Sexy Butt!!!

Houki Shinonono bunny figure manufactured by FREEing company. Priced at 21,111 Yen and scheduled for release in September 2016.

Infinite Stratos - Bunny Girls Figure Full Set!

Source http://www.goodsmile.info/ja/product/5556/

↧

↧

Dagashi Kashi Original Soundtrack

Dagashi Kashi Original Soundtrack composed by Tomotaka Osumi (大隅知宇) and Nobuaki Nobusawa (信澤宣明).

Published By : Pony Canyon

Release Date : 16 March 2016

Catalog No. : PCCG-1523

Number of Discs : 1

Dagashi Kashi (だがしかし) is a comedy anime by feel. studio. The anime takes place during the summer in rural areas in Japan. The exciting story began when Kokonotsu met with Hotaru Shidare (枝垂 ほたる) a lovely girl who knows virtually every snack. Kokonotsu Shikada (鹿田 ココノツ) is the protagonist who want to be a manga artist, unfortunately, his father wanted him to carry on their candy/snack shop.

The anime shows you the daily lives of rural teenagers in Japan, classical objects, especially candy and snacks that you may never see in a big city. The background scenes filled with nature, countryside and forests. The background music is a blend between old and modern music, most are summer sounds such as bells and cicadas.

If you like a novelty or interested in Japanese candy, I think Dagashi Kashi is right for you.

My favorite song is Checkmate!? the 2nd single release from MICHI is used as opening theme for "Dagashi Kashi (だがしかし)" anime series.

Dimension W Original Soundtrack: Resonance W

Dimension W Original Soundtrack: Resonance W composed by Go Shiina (椎名豪) and Yoshiaki Fujisawa (藤澤慶昌).

Published By : Lantis

Release Date : 23 March 2016

Catalog No. : LACA-9444

Number of Discs : 2

Dimension W (ディメンション ダブリュー) Sci-Fi anime about robots, energy and the fourth dimension called W. The story takes place in the near future where fuel is scarce. Electric power was canceled. Nowadays, The global is drawing energy from the W dimension. The energy that never runs out. The protagonist is Kyouma Mabuchi (マブチ・キョーマ) a young man who stuck with the painful past. He had met Mira Yurizaki (百合崎 ミラ) a cute robot in a night that will change his life forever.

The background scene is filled with building. I felt that the story tries to pump ton of tension all the time. There's mystery and horror of the dimension W you might be interested if you like science. I highly recommend Dimension W anime series if you like a mystery that comes with a cute girl.

My favorite song is Contrast pop-rock single release from a Japanese rock-band Fo'xTails is used as anime ending theme for "Dimension W (ディメンション ダブリュー)" series.

Disc 1

Hatsune Miku Orange Blossom figure

Hatsune Miku Orange Blossom really looks like a Japanese idol. She's appearing in Sega's rhythm game "Hatsune Miku -Project DIVA- F 2nd". The outfit is the perfect combination of sexy and adorable. The module designed by Nidy-2D-. If you are Hatsune Miku (初音ミク) fan, take her to the heaven now!!!

She has become a dish that can be enjoyed in every corner. ლ(́◉◞౪◟◉‵ლ)

I love Miku in Orange Blossom outfit, especially her beautiful slender hair. (｡♥‿♥｡)

Wrinkles on her clothes, It's so realistic! ヾ(｡･ω･)ｼ

Max Factory 1/7 scale Hatsune Miku Orange Blossom ver. will be released on Goodsmile shop in October 2016. (ﾉ´ヮ´)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧ Priced at 16,000 Yen!

Thanks, More details: http://ameblo.jp/gsc-mikatan/entry-12142947091.html

http://www.goodsmile.info/ja/product/5558/

↧

Spring 2016 Anime You Should Watch

This is my personal "Spring 2016 Anime" recommendation. The best list of Spring 2016 Anime for all you anime lovers. Most anime at this time of the year is about "School or Academy" because Spring is the beginning of student life in Japan. Sadly... nearly all of them are general-school anime, dull and boring. Therefore, i'll focus on anime series about fighting (with something). I hope you'll enjoy~

1. Bakuon!!

Japanese: ばくおん！！

Genres: Comedy, School, Seinen

Studio: TMS Entertainment

Official Site: http://bakuon-anime.com

You should not miss if you like motorcycles. Bakuon!! is the combination of school girls and vehicles. The story about a relationship in motorcycle club in a high school.

2. Boku no Hero Academia

Japanese: 僕のヒーローアカデミア

Genres: Action, Adventure, Comedy, Shounen, Supernatural

Studio: Bones

Official Site: http://heroaca.com

Have you ever dreamed about heroes or having super powers? If you liked Heroes you will like this anime too. The anime story takes place in a world where most people have special powers. This show will teach you how to be a real hero.

3. Hundred

Japanese: ハンドレッド

Genres: Action, Ecchi, Harem, Mecha, Romance, School, Sci-Fi

Studio: Production IMS

Official Site: http://hundred-anime.jp

Hundred is the ultimate weapon.... but... who care about that? The main point of this anime is a lovely princess with huge Oppai!!

4. Kokoro ga Sakebitagatterunda.

Japanese: 心が叫びたがってるんだ。

Genres: Drama

Studio: A-1 Pictures

Official Site: http://kokosake.jp

Kokosake, a drama anime that might make you cry. This movie reminds me of AnoHana series. I quite like the white female uniform, simple and lovable. Enjoy with symphonic music and beautiful backgrounds.

5. Koutetsujou no Kabaneri

Japanese: 甲鉄城のカバネリ

Genres: Action, Fantasy

Studio: Wit Studio

Official Site: http://kabaneri.com

Attack on Titan steampunk style! This anime is a struggle to survive in zombie world. You have to watch this series if you like blood and death.

6. Netoge no Yome wa Onnanoko ja Nai to Omotta?

Japanese: ネトゲの嫁は女の子じゃないと思った?

Genres: Comedy, Ecchi, Romance, School

Studio: Project No.9

Official Site: http://netogenoyome.com

What will happen if a female player falls in love with you while playing an online game?! The peak of gamer life!! You can choose your fate but not your destiny. Watch this anime if you want to see cute girl services.

7. Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu

Japanese: Re：ゼロから始める異世界生活

Genres: Drama, Fantasy

Studio: White Fox

Official Site: http://re-zero-anime.jp

What should you do if you get stuck with a cute girl in a fantasy world. What is that lucky event?! A silver-haired girl in this anime looks so cute. RPG-gamers don't miss!!!

↧

↧

Genso Koryu - Moe Expressway Girls

Anime is Everything and Everywhere! It's time to make Japanese roads look more adorable.

The event was a collaboration between NEXCO Central Japan, Kadokawa and Dwango. They had agreed to create Genso Koryu (幻想交流) project. It's a collection of various special expressway in the form of Moe Anime Girls.

The story about a world called Kibou Else. This world has been destroyed due to the aftermath of world wars in the past. Fortunately, There're cute girls (the character designs based on roads in Japan) who can cure the disastrous world.

The project is in the process of creating. Official site: https://genso-koryu.jp/

More detail about the girls' expressway http://internetcom.jp/200522/genso-koryu

↧

Resurgence! Shin Godzilla Promo Video

Godzilla Resurgence! This is the newest Japanese's Godzilla film titled "Shin Godzilla (シン・ゴジラ)" the king of kaiju. The Godzilla disappeared from cinema screens for 12 years. It's returning to its homeland.

This time, It looks darker and more serious than the original (in 1954). The new Godzilla directed by Higuchi Shinji (Attack On Titan Live-Action).

Shin Godzilla film will be released in Japan on July 29, 2016. It will feature IMAX, MX4D and 4DX

Official site: http://shin-godzilla.jp/

↧

Alloy Shimakaze figure - Kawaii KanColle rising

Kawaii destroyer class! Shimakaze (島風) is one of sexiest characters in Kantai Collection (艦隊これくしょん) series, a popular game browser in Japan. ヾ(｡･ω･)ｼ

Shimakaze is like the heroine for her fans. ［╹△╹］ She has been very popular. I rather like Alloy Shimakaze figure because the Alloy armor made her look strong.

Alloy is Shimakaze's new armor. The armor gives her melee weapons like a warrior in the battlefield. o(≧∇≦o) Hell Yeah~

The weapon in her right hand looks like a hammer, while the weapon in her left hand looks like a shield.

KanColle - Alloy Shimakaze figure will be released in October 2016. Priced at 13,704 （ﾉ｡≧◇≦）ﾉ

Figure Site http://www.goodsmile.info/ja/product/5583/

Thanks and more picutre at http://ameblo.jp/gsc-mikatan/entry-12147414015.html

Don't miss KanColle anime series: http://kancolle-anime.jp/

↧

Square Enix announces Valkyrie Anatomia The Origin mobile game

Square Enix (スクウェア・エニックス) a Japanese video game developer has announced its newest mobile game titled VALKYRIE ANATOMIA -THE ORIGIN- (ヴァルキリーアナトミア ‐ジ・オリジン-) - www.valkyrieanatomia.com, and launched the promo video on Youtube.

The RPG game will be released on iOS and Android smartphone platform in spring 2016. (The game logo looks very similar to Valkyrie Profile)

VALKYRIE ANATOMIA -THE ORIGIN- is directed by Yamagishi Yoshinori (Valkyrie Profile, Star Ocean RPGs), composed by Sakuraba Motoi (Saiyuki, Valkyrie Profile, Tales of, and Star Ocean RPGs), and written by Fujisawa Bunou (Yuuyake Dandan). (It looked like a big game! I hope so.)

The characters and voice actors:

Lenneth Valkyria voiced by Sawashiro Miyuki (沢城 みゆき)

Odin voiced by Yamadera Kouichi (山寺 宏一)

Sena voiced by Sakura Ayane (佐倉 綾音)

Darine voiced by Nabatame Hitomi (生天目 仁美)

The story takes place before Valkyrie Profile timeline. Lenneth Valkyria is obviously the main character because her name, and her character is on the art-cover!

↧

↧

MUSIC×STUDY PROJECT - study history and science by listening to Vocaloid music

Japanese textbook publisher Gakken Plus (学研プラス) has a great idea to keep students turned their attention to study history and science. It's called MUSIC×STUDY PROJECT, the future of textbook that will change the way of learning.

It's a compilation of contents, and convert them into Vocaloid music by telling the contents through the songs. The lyrics have been profoundly rewritten by famous Vocaloid producers: Rerulili, 40mP, Travolta-P, Kanimiso-P and Toa.

The textbooks will be released in two volumes. The pink textbook (ボカロで覚える 中学歴史) is history, the blue/ green textbook (ボカロで覚える 中学理科) is science.

Each book contains 10 tracks of Vocaloid music, distributed by its lessons, including various explanations in the lyrics.

Learners can download MUSIC×STUDY PROJECT's music into their smartphones, PC or tablets by scanning the square code in each lesson.

MUSIC×STUDY PROJECT textbook was released on April 22, 2016. It is gaining in popularity.

Gakken Plus official site http://gakken-plus.co.jp/

History book: http://hon.gakken.jp/book/1130440100

Science book: http://hon.gakken.jp/book/1130449500

↧

Sayaka Sasaki (佐咲紗花) - FEEL×ALIVE Lyrics

Sayaka Sasaki (佐咲紗花) - FEEL×ALIVE Japanese Kanji & Romaji Lyrics 歌詞

"FEEL×ALIVE", a cheerful single release from Sayaka Sasaki lovely Japanese musician signed to Lantis. The single is used as opening theme for "Bakuon!! (ばくおん!!)" motorcycle TV anime series by TMS Entertainment.

The anime and music are closely linked. The music video about the route and frolic as you can see in the video. Sayaka ran out on the road along with her happiness. The title "FEEL×ALIVE" means to do what you feel satisfied, it is an important aspect of life.

Artist : Sayaka Sasaki

Release Date : 27 April 2016

--------------------

この坂を上り切ったら

必ず見える景色が好きだって

背中に羽を持つあの子も言って笑ってた

Kono saka wo nobori kittara

Kanarazu mieru keshiki ga suki datte

Senaka ni hane wo motsu anoko moitte waratteta

ドキドキが一瞬で

トキメキになっていくんだなんて

あの頃は信じられなくて

ただ見惚れていたよ

Dokidoki ga isshun de

Tokimeki ni natte iku nda nante

Anogoro wa shinji rarenakute

Tada mihorete ita yo

このスピードに乗せた体温が

今全身で伝う 通じ合う

物語の鍵はこの手に

ぎゅっと強く握っているから

Kono supido ni noseta taion ga

Ima zenshin de tsutau tsuuji au

Monogatari no kagi wa konote ni

Gyutto tsuyoku nigitte irukara

感じて 応えて 風になる

空に溶けて海を抱きしめる

新しい世界が見えるはず

さぁ確かめに行ってみよう

Kanjite kotaete kaze ni naru

Sora ni tokete umi wo dakishimeru

Atarashii sekai ga mieru hazu

Saa tashikame ni itte miyou

恋したり夢見たり

一日だって同じ日はないから

いつだって全力で今日を走り抜けていこう

Koi shi tari yumemi tari

Tsuitachi datte onaji hi wanaikara

Itsu datte zenryoku de kyou wo hashirinukete ikou

隣で笑い合う

それだけで全部わかってくから

本音でぶつかった痛みも

もう忘れていたよ

Tonari de warai au

Sore dake de zenbu wakatte kukara

Honne de butsukatta itami mo

Mou wasurete ita yo

もっと加速度を上げて太陽に

口づけるくらいに近づいて

風向きはいつも自分次第

ほら夜明けはもうすぐだよ

Motto kasokudo wo agete taiyou ni

Kuchidzukeru kurai ni chikadzuite

Kazamuki wa itsumo jibun shidai

Hora yoake wa mousuguda yo

こんな気持ちになるって

こんな日々が来るって

想像以上のキセキ

そう もっと遠くへ

明日のもっと先へいこう

胸の高鳴りが止められない

この瞬間を生きてる！

Konna kimochi ni naru tte

Konna hibi ga kuru tte

Souzouijou no kiseki

Sou mottotohkuhe

Ashita no motto saki he ikou

Munenotakanari ga tomerarenai

Kono shunkan wo iki teru!

このスピードに乗せた爆音が

今全身で伝う 通じ合う

物語の鍵はこの手に

ぎゅっと強く握っているから

Kono supido ni noseta bakuon ga

Ima zenshin de tsutau tsuuji au

Monogatari no kagi wa konote ni

Gyutto tsuyoku nigitte irukara

感じて 応えて 風になる

空に溶けて海を抱きしめる

新しい世界が見えるから

さぁその手を伸ばして

Our ride! 確かめに行ってみよう

Kanjite kotaete kaze ni naru

Sora ni tokete umi wo dakishimeru

Atarashii sekai ga mierukara

Saa sono te wo nobashite

Our ride! tashikame ni itte miyou

Just FEEL ALIVE with me!!

--------------------

I quite like the lyrics because it is telling the ways to live life to the fullest. Overall, I rate this music video 8/10. The rhythm of the music have fun, festive, and feel liberated.

I highly recommend Bakuon!! manga and anime series if you like or look for something that called Freedom. This anime explicitly about motorcycles, but it will actually show you how to live happily with your friends.

↧

Eromanga Sensei - Sagiri Izumi adorable figure

Sagiri Izumi ~ヾ(＾∇＾) She is actually a 12-year-old girl. I like her because the figure looks very charming.

She looks so adorable! （‐＾▽＾‐）

Eromanga Sensei (エロマンガ先生) is a drama-comedy novel/manga about a light novel author named Masamune Izumi (和泉 正宗) who met with a lovely illustrator named "Eromanga", her real name is Sagiri Izumi (和泉 紗霧).

You can see her butt !!! °˖✧◝(⁰▿⁰)◜✧˖°

The main point is that Sagiri is Masamune's younger sister. ∑(ﾟﾛﾟ〃) So, This novel is a love story between siblings!

Extremely charming~ (≧∇≦*)

1/8th Scale Sagiri Izumi figure manufactured by AQUAMARINE. The price is 9,800 yen.

The figure store: http://www.goodsmile.info/ja/product/5647/

wikipedia site: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eromanga_Sensei

Manga Reviews

I highly recommend Eromanga Sensei if you like Oreimo series.

↧

Gate and Kinmoza! anime helmet for bikers

A-TOYS, a manufacturer of anime toys is preparing to release a new anime product in the summer of Japan to support Japanese motorcycle riders who love anime.

The new product is a helmet with two popular anime patterns

Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite, Kaku Tatakaeri (GATE（ゲート）自衛隊 彼の地にて、斯く戦えり) know as "GATE" Fantasy-Military anime series by A-1 Pictures

Kiniro Mosaic (きんいろモザイク) know as "Kinmoza!" School-Slice of Life anime series by Studio Gokumi

The anime helmet is priced at 11,880 yen and is scheduled for release in July 2016. The helmet size is Free Size head circumference 57-60 centimeters, suitable for riding on public roads in Japan with 125cc motorcycles or below.

Moreover, the face shield can reduce UV light up to 90%, and you can remove the cold weather ear covers if you do not like.

↧

↧

Konomi Suzuki (鈴木このみ) - Redo Lyrics

Konomi Suzuki (鈴木このみ) - Redo Japanese Kanji & Romaji Lyrics 歌詞

"Redo", the 10th single release from Konomi Suzuki a mellow singer from Osaka who is signed to Media Factory. The single is used as opening theme for "Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu (Re：ゼロから始める異世界生活)" adventure-fantasy anime series by White Fox studio.

Overall, I rate this Pop-Rock song 7/10. I quite like its music video theme. It's called Monochrome if I remember correctly. This song is obviously focused on the vocals. The lyrics about attempting to protect the future of her lover. The fight with yourself that never ends. The theme, singer and lyrics, they blend perfectly.

Artist : Konomi Suzuki

Release Date : 11 May 2016

--------------------

自分の過去に囚われ迷って

そうじゃないよと 言い聞かせて 全てを

自由に操れるかなんて

分からないよと 空は霞んで

正解はどこ？

Jibun no kako ni toraware mayotte

Sou janai yo to iikikasete subetewo

Jiyuu ni ayatsureru ka nante

Wakaranai yo to sora wa kasunde

Seikai wa doko?

僕の手のひらに 残る大事なもの

忘れない記憶 何度でも

君を守り抜くと叫んで

巻き戻しの中 掴んだ愛はそう

離しはしないから

Boku no tenohira ni nokoru daijinamono

Wasurenai kioku nandodemo

Kimi wo mamorinuku to sakende

Maki modoshi no naka tsukanda ai wa sou

Hanashi wa shinaikara

散りばめた想い 今一度きりの願いへ

次への僕に 託したよ

いつかの約束 光の道しるべになる

誓いをさあ君のため 最期まで

涙さえ力に変えてきっと 描いていた望む未来へ繋ぐよ

Chiribameta omoi imaichido kiri no negai he

Tsugi he no boku ni takushita yo

Itsuka no yakusoku kou no michishirube ni naru

Chikai wo sakun no tame saigo made

Namida sae chikara ni kaete kitto kaite ita nozomu mirai he tsunagu yo

想像を超える事態に 狂って

爪を立てては もがき足掻いて 心は

人生の過ちを もう何回

繰り返しては 嫌いになって

泣いてても

Souzou wo koeru jitai ni kurutte

Tsume wo tatete wa mogaki agaite kokoro wa

Jinsei no ayamachi wo mou nankai

Sourihenshite wa kirai ni natte

Nai tete mo

君の憧れは いつも輝いてた

Kimi no akogare wa itsumo kagayaite ita

I'll come back (Yeah) I'll come back (Yeah)

To your future (Go away)

僕は抗うだろう 運命に

Boku wa aragaudarou unmei ni

Breaking out (Yeah) Breaking out (Yeah)

Breaking dawn (Yeah Go away)

諦めちゃいないから

Akiramecha inaikara

結ばれた意思は 独りきりじゃない強さへ

紡いだ糸を 手繰り寄せ

見つけた瞳は 理想を現実に変える

世界はそう君のため 最初から

胸に抱いた思い出とずっと あの日から続く決意で

飛べるよ Redo

Musuba reta ishi wa hitori kiri janai tsuyo-sa he

Tsumuida ito wo taguri yose

Mitsuketa hitomi wa risou wo genjitsu ni kaeru

Sekai wa sou kimi no tame saisho kara

Mune ni daita omoide to zutto ano Nitsu kara tsudzuku ketsui de

Toberu yo Redo

君がたとえ僕のこと

忘れても 僕はもう忘れない 誰も傷つけない

Kimi ga tatoe boku no koto

Wasurete mo boku wa mou wasurenai dare mo kizutsukenai

消えそうな過去を 救い出すための時間よ

ここから始まれ

Kie souna kako wo sukuidasu tame no jikan yo

Koko kara hajimaru

巡りゆく一瞬を 今一度きりの願いへ

確かに僕は 託された

いつかの約束 光の道しるべになる

誓いをさあ君のため 最期まで

涙さえ力に変えてきっと 描いていた望む未来へ 繋ぐよ

Meguri yuku isshun wo imaichido kiri no negai he

Tashikani boku wa takusa reta

Itsuka no yakusoku kou no michishirube ni naru

Chikai wo sakun no tame saigo made

Namida sae chikara ni kaete kitto kaite ita nozomu mirai he tsunagu yo

--------------------

Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu is an anime that comes with the feeling of the hero in RPG games. If you like playing Japanese RPG games, I recommend Re:Zero anime series. The story is really exotic. The protagonist have to fight and die to change the past and the future in order to protect the important people. It's a spring 2016 anime you should watch!

↧

Nendoroid Aqua - KonoSuba lovely goddess

Aqua (アクア) is a goddess in Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! (この素晴らしい世界に祝福を！) manga/anime series. (〃・ω・〃)ノ~☆ She seemed worthless when in the anime world because she had never done anything useful.

She is such a nuisance! (･ω･`〃) However, Aqua still looks beautiful and lovely, especially the Nendoroid figure from Good Smile Company. (｡・//ε//・｡)

Nendoroid Aqua comes with a pink wand, her useless weapon. ヾ(｡･ω･)ｼ

Aqua face while disturbing you (ﾉ｀Д´)ﾉ

She often cried when she was very scared ( ´•̥̥̥ω•̥̥̥` )

KonoSuba - Nendoroid Aqua priced at 4,167 yen, and will be released in November 2016.

Store site: http://www.goodsmile.info/ja/product/5675/ねんどろいど+アクア.html

More Nendoroid Pictures: http://ameblo.jp/gsc-mikatan/entry-12161040115.html

Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! is a comedy anime about fantasy world. The story does not focus on the adventure of brave Heroes. The experiences will directly opposite to what you expect... in a good way.

Neko wedding rings! Cute and Beautiful

Neko wedding rings! (=^･ｪ･^=) If you like cats, wanted to buy a gift for yourself and a loved one, or a young man who would like to marry a girl, these rings are very good choices.

Obviously, the ring design is a cat face with neko ears. It has a sleek silver beauty. There's a diamond bead is being carried by a cat's paw. (=ΦｴΦ=) That is a nice idea!

There was also a gold color. It makes the ring looks striking. (^･o･^)ﾉ”

Moreover, there's the prettiest super luxury ring! (^=˃ᆺ˂) The cat face was surrounded with diamonds. It looks very dominant.

The price for the most luxurious neko wedding ring is 225,000 yen! about 2,000 USD!!! (*✧×✧*)

Store and More information http://www.afflux.jp/collection/n-e-k-o.html

Published By : Aniplex

Release Date : 18 May 2016

Catalog No. : SVWC-70149

Number of Discs : 1

Koutetsujou no Kabaneri (甲鉄城のカバネリ) Action-Fantasy anime series by Wit Studio. The story about the slaughter and survival. It takes place in a cruel world. You have to fight against zombies to save your homeland. This anime is very interesting for me. It is similar to Attack on Titan series, but quite different in terms of the characters and enemies.

My favorite song is ninelie, euphemistic single performed by Aimer (エメ) a lovely Japanese singer from Kumamoto. This song is used as anime ending theme for "Koutetsujou no Kabaneri (甲鉄城のカバネリ)" series.

Overwatch - Japanese trailers

OverWatch (オーバーウォッチ) is a FPS game that I highly recommend if you like shooting games, focused on the fight as a team. The game developed by Blizzard company. Unfortunately, there is no the story-single mode in the game, however, the company has released the game story through various media such as animation trailers on Youtube.

And they came out quite well. There are customizable contents and languages to reach more people in each region. Square Enix is the OverWatch publisher in Japan. The game comes with Japanese voices. You may like OverWatch with Japanese language if you like watching anime.

GENJI voiced by Kawahara Yoshihisa

HANZO voiced by Sakaguchi Shuhei

Tokyo Philharmonic Orchestra announces Hatsune Miku Symphony live

Hatsune Miku (初音ミク) will be performed with an orchestra live again after she spellbound the world by joined in the singing with NHK Symphony Orchestra (NHK交響楽団) at the beginning of the year.

Tokyo Philharmonic Orchestra (東京フィルハーモニー交響楽団) the oldest classical orchestra in Japan has announced a live show featuring Hatsune Miku titled “Hatsune Miku Symphony (初音ミクシンフォニー)” all of the music performances will be Miku's songs.

The live show will be held on August 26, 2016. You can buy tickets at FamilyMart convenience store in Japan from May 31 to June 13. The special ticket is priced at 14,800 yen (come with a special giveaway).

Miku in the black tuxedo has been designed by KEI, the original Miku character's creator.

More details: http://www.animatetimes.com/news/details.php?id=1464599835

Official site: http://sp.wmg.jp/mikusymphony/

↧
